title: Kasumin’s Perfect Plan : Day 4
detail_text: <:th_ch0202/>A spell that will make people that you successfully prank love you, so far it’s a total failure. Even though Kasumin wanted to make this spell work while Kasumin’s luck is still at it’s best…. Kasumin wants to be popular~. Since it came down to this, Kasumin has to use Kasumin’s own powers…. Yeah. There’s no other way! Let’s do this----!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Kasumi-chan? Why are you shouting like that?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Are you hungry?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Riko-senpai, Chika-senpai! No, it’s umm~, it’s nothing…. Kasumin isn’t hungry either<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>You don’t get it, do you? Eating before you get hungry is better for your appearance<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Eh~, why is that?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Huh? It’s got to do with…. your blood sugar level, insu…. something, stuff like that<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>It’s insulin. I guess you don’t know much about it either, Nico-chan<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>What did you say~!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Ah, well, in that case, Kasumin made some bread rolls for everyone today. Would you guys like to eat them?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Eeh! Kasumi-chan’s bread rolls!? I want to eat them!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Waah, I’m so happy<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Nico-chan is looking like she’s begging for it, sorry<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>I’m not begging for it!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Well, well, don’t sweat the small stuff, please help yourselves! Kasumin made some snacks too~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>(Kufufu, one of them is Kasumin’s special mustard-filled bread roll though….!)<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Alright, then I won’t hold back. I’ll pick~, umm…. this one!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>So close!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Eh?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>I-, it’s nothing~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Then maybe I’ll take this one<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Bingo!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Eh?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>I- I-, It’s really nothing~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Fufu, it seems really delicious. I love sandwiches, so I’m very happy for the bread roll sandwich! Thank you!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Aa, Ahh.... Riko-senpai, rather than that one, this one here…. is my recommendation.... Umm, it’s actually delicious, so….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Then I’ll go with the one Riko-chan picked<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Ah-! ….No, that one is…. Kasumin will eat that one…. There’s one with Mikan jam for Chika-senpai….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Kasumi, why are you making that face….?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Aaargh! Leave Kasumin alone-!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
